title: Area of tenements coming to MHADA's share at location 'B' in CDS = Area of tenements coming to MHADA
clause_text: Area of tenements coming to MHADA's share at location 'B' in CDS = Area of tenements coming to MHADA's share at location 'A' in CDS X land rate as per ASR value of location 'A'/ land rate as per ASR value of location 'B'
